channel.title: .::X-Scape 317/525/608::
channel.description:
X-Scape's Features:
•99% Dicing •100% Working Summoning •699+ Interfaces •New Bosses •New Hitsplats •Working Clan Chat •Working Curses, Ancients & Lunar •602 Anims & Stances & Items
And alot more features ! [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7twKnZvEu7Q&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
And Forum can be found on; http://x-scape317.tk/ / pictures will be uploaded on forum so check it out ! The X-Scape Official client can be downloaded on forum !
Kind Regards,
Illusion X !
New VIDEO! [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9ZRgivbbptE&list=HL1340898653&feature=mh_lolz[/youtube]
